actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT p.uuid AS uuid, p.name AS name, pu.uuid AS project_user, r.name AS role, cu.uuid AS client_user, c.name AS client, u.name AS user, u.uuid AS user_uuid, u.email AS user_email


FROM public."project" p
LEFT JOIN public."project_user" pu ON pu.project = p.uuid
LEFT JOIN public."_role" r ON r.uuid = pu.role 
LEFT JOIN public."_client_user" cu ON cu.uuid = pu.client_user
LEFT JOIN public."_client" c ON p.client = c.uuid
LEFT JOIN public."_user" u ON u.uuid = cu.user
WHERE u.email = '{{appsmith.user.email}}'
ORDER BY p.name;
